goal.name: cvs:make-patch
goal.echo:
Please create a new issue in PicoContainer's JIRA: http://jira.codehaus.org/secure/BrowseProject.jspa?id=10120 Then attach the patch.txt file. If your patch consists of entirely new files too, please zip them up and attach them too.
If your patch includes JUnit tests and a decent description, you increase the chance of having the patch applied by some of the committers.
